sys_ui_message.message:
Problems come and go, and we want to help you solve yours as fast as possible.
1. [Resetting your password or unlocking your account](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Du47I7DTmU72acdAoNg91hRQsQu4FTH4/edit) 2. [Mobile Assistance](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mNfBRH-AgKwNcyAiESVW1twM5ERYKQ3O/edit) 3. [Self service channels for faster technical assistance](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dAWR5Kq67JuzT5DpyrSKzJpVsKzQZkxg/edit)
For more information, please visit the [IT Service Portal](https://absa.service-now.com/sp?id=index)
